sentence.Network_en: My mother has had unsightly varicose veins for years.
sentence.Network_cn: 我母亲多年来一直患有难看的静脉曲张。

sentence.Network_en: The Polish market in Berlin was considered unsightly and shut down.
sentence.Network_cn: 柏林市内的波兰市场因为被认为有碍观瞻而关闭了。

sentence.Network_en: The marking on the wall was childish and unsightly.
sentence.Network_cn: 墙上的记号幼稚而难看.

entry.tran: 难看的；不悦目的；不雅观的
entry.def: If you describe something as unsightly, you mean that it is unattractive to look at.

example.ex: My mother has had unsightly varicose veins for years...
example.tran: 我母亲多年来一直患有难看的静脉曲张。

example.ex: The Polish market in Berlin was considered unsightly and shut down.
example.tran: 柏林市内的波兰市场因为被认为有碍观瞻而关闭了。

auth_sentence.content: But the snails are not just an unsightly pest.
auth_sentence.res_content: But the snails are not just an unsightly pest.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the snails are not just an unsightly pest.

auth_sentence.content: The average gent, it seems, is quite unsightly.
auth_sentence.res_content: The average gent, it seems, is quite unsightly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The average gent, it seems, is quite unsightly.

auth_sentence.content: Crying always made my nose unsightly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Crying always made my nose unsightly.

sentences.en: His skin was covered with unsightly blotches.
sentences.cn: 他的皮肤上长满了难看的疹块。
